post:
## About us

Misaka Network LLC is a Wyoming registered LLC (Filling ID 2017-000756675).

We are a [RIPE NCC LIR member](https://www.ripe.net/membership/indices/data/us.misaka.html) and also run our own network [AS57695](bgp.he.net/AS57695).

## Features

- SolusVM Powered (Working on own panel ... but we can only provide SolusVM now)
- Native IPv6
- BGP Session Available
- 3 day Money Back Guarantee
- Full root access


## Offer

US-IAD-SAS1024 <del>$12.99/mo</del> 6.49 USD

- CPU 1 vCPU (E3-1230 v5)
- RAM 1G DDR4
- Storage 10G SAS (HW RAID 1)
- Bandwidth 1T (FREE INBOUND)
- Uplink 2 * 1Gbps
- IPv4 1 * /32
- IPv6 1 * /128
- BGP Session + 15 USD Setup Fee (Waived if paid annually)


Looking Glass: http://us-iad01.lg.zeptovm.com/

BGP Looking Glass: https://lg.as57695.net/summary/us-iad01/ipv4

Test IP Address: 199.119.65.5

Test IPv6: 2a0b:4342:3000:1::233

Datacenter: i3d Washington (CoreSite VA1)
